verses.verse: וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> there arose אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> And after אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Abimelech לְהוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H3467><s%> to defend אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel תּוֹלָ֧ע <S%H8439><s%> Tola בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פּוּאָ֛ה <S%H6312><s%> of Puah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דּוֹד֖וֹ <S%H1734><s%> of Dodo אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> and he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> and he dwelt בְּשָׁמִ֖יר <S%H8069><s%> in Shamir בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim

וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <S%H8199><s%> And he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וְשָׁלֹ֖שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> and died וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּשָׁמִֽיר׃ <S%H8069><s%> in Shamir פ

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> him arose אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> And after יָאִ֖יר <S%H2971><s%> Jair הַגִּלְעָדִ֑י <S%H1569><s%> a Gileadite וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <S%H8199><s%> and judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֞וֹ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> And he had thirty בָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> sons רֹֽכְבִים֙ <S%H7392><s%> that rode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> on thirty עֲיָרִ֔ים <S%H5895><s%> ass colts וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> and they had thirty עֲיָרִ֖ים <S%H5895><s%> donkeys לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like לָהֶ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> that יִקְרְא֣וּ ׀ <S%H7121><s%> which are called חַוֹּ֣ת יָאִ֗יר <S%H2334><s%> Havothjair עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> it בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> which [are] in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead
וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died יָאִ֔יר <S%H2971><s%> And Jair וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּקָמֽוֹן׃ <S%H7056><s%> in Camon פ

וַיֹּסִ֣פוּ ׀ <S%H3254><s%> again בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> did הָרַע֮ <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּעָלִ֣ים <S%H1168><s%> Baalim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעַשְׁתָּר֡וֹת <S%H6252><s%> and Ashtaroth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> and the gods אֲרָם֩ <S%H758><s%> of Syria וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> and the gods צִיד֜וֹן <S%H6721><s%> of Zidon וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> and the gods מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> and the gods בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> and the gods פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיַּעַזְב֥וּ <S%H5800><s%> and forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not עֲבָדֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> and served

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was hot אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵם֙ <S%H4376><s%> and he sold בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hands פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וּבְיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> and into the hands בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַֽיִּרְעֲצ֤וּ <S%H7492><s%> they vexed וַיְרֹֽצְצוּ֙ <S%H7533><s%> and oppressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> And that year הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֜ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> years אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> they all בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> which [is] in Gilead

וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> passed over בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Moreover the children עַמּוֹן֙ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan לְהִלָּחֵ֛ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בִּיהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> also against Judah וּבְבִנְיָמִ֖ין <S%H1144><s%> and against Benjamin וּבְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and against the house אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וַתֵּ֥צֶר <S%H3334><s%> distressed לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> so that Israel מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> was sore

וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> cried בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying חָטָ֣אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> We have sinned לָ֔ךְ וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <S%H5800><s%> against thee both because we have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> and also served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H1168><s%> Baalim פ

וַ֥יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> [Did] not [I deliver you] from the Egyptians וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> and from the Amorites וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> from the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> Philistine

וְצִידוֹנִ֤ים <S%H6722><s%> The Zidonians וַֽעֲמָלֵק֙ <S%H6002><s%> also and the Amalekites וּמָע֔וֹן <S%H4584><s%> and the Maonites לָחֲצ֖וּ <S%H3905><s%> did oppress אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַתִּצְעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> you and ye cried אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to וָאוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <S%H3467><s%> to me and I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> you out of their hand

וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5800><s%> Yet ye have forsaken אוֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> וַתַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> me and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other לָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no אוֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> you no more לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> wherefore I will deliver אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

לְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְזַֽעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> and cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H977><s%> which ye have chosen בָּ֑ם הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> let them יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <S%H3467><s%> deliver לָכֶ֖ם בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> you in the time צָרַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H6869><s%> of your tribulation

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD חָטָ֔אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> We have sinned עֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> do אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you לָ֔נוּ כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thou unto us whatsoever seemeth אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> only הַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <S%H5337><s%> unto thee deliver נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> please הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> us only we pray thee this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיָּסִ֜ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> And they put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> the strange מִקִּרְבָּ֔ם <S%H7130><s%> from among וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> them and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <S%H7114><s%> was grieved נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> and his soul בַּעֲמַ֥ל <S%H5999><s%> for the misery יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וַיִּצָּֽעֲקוּ֙ <S%H6817><s%> were gathered together בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Then the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בַּגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> in Gilead וַיֵּאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> assembled themselves together בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> in Mizpeh

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> [and] princes גִלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to another מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> What man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יָחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> [is he] that will begin לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> Ammon יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> over all the inhabitants גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead פ
